tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
We took a boy for his left leg treatment, his leg's condition was so bad. Dr Sachin bhonsle made a team for discussing an issue to take proper decision on this delicate issue.
Dr Sachin bhonsle is really an experienced and humble practitioner, his guidance is very polite. Caring towards patient. And and he knows how to save patient's money. 
Thanks a lot for your behaviour dear doctor 
Thanks a lot
reply_text: Thank you for note of appreciation. Always happy to help

review: Not the friendliest consultation I have had. ** ***** **** ************* *** possibly great with his work, but first impression seems to be dismissive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is very professional and his diagnosis was spot on. He guided us on the right treatment and also alerted us what to not to get swayed with. My mom had knee issues so besides treatment he guided us why we shouldn’t go for knee replacement which some others doctors may prescribe. Her knee was all good in sometime. When we were changing cities he got us in touch with the right doctor to continue the treatment. He even replied on emails when I needed help from the other city. I highly recommend him.

My wife received well enough and satisfied treatment . Wish to revisit for follow up treatment.Very warm and affectionate to the patient. Very attentive to hear and supportive in nature. My regards and best wishes.
